oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded in March 24, 2006 with Maryam Maḥmūd Asʻad, female, born in Fārah, Palestine and resides in Saida, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع مريم محمود أسعد في 24 آذار مارس عام 2006، انثى، ولدت في قرية فارة، فلسطين وتقيم في صيدا، لبنان
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Social life and events practices in Fārah . (@ 0:00)
Political and economic conditions in Fārah during the Zionist occupation and expulsion to Lebanon. (@ 23:11)
